metadata.name: Deprived - Kayapo HC16
metadata.description:
Using UV sensitive body paint, I isolate the aboriginal body art to leave their bodies into darkness, metaphor of how indigenous people have become invisible to our modern society.
â€¨I honor pre-Columbian original peoples of the Americas with the infinite & universal space of my body mandalas, in an attempt to rescue the brightness and fluorescence of these civilizations.

Collection: Deprived Series
Resolution: 3,333 x 3,333 px (.MP4)
Photography work & Music by Federico Bianchi
